name: Mesh Runner 2
description:
Long awaited sequel to the cult classic Mesh Runner.

Become MESH MAN and strafe and jump your way through the hazards of the mesh space in this retro-style infinite runner. Collect sacred geometry to rack up a high score, and fill the warp meter to defy the laws of physics and blast through obstacles at hyper speed!

Photosensitivity Warning! This game includes frequent flashing images.

Controls
  • Strafe - A and D or left and right arrow keys
  • Jump - Space bar
  • Warp - Shift (when the warp meter is filled)
